Access Rights and Users

The tool required for configuring system users, user groups and access rights depends on the type of CareSuite installation you have:

l If Anesthesia Manager is configured for perioperative integration with OR Manager, users and access rights for both applications are handled in Picis Security Manager.

For more information, see Configure the system for perioperative integration and the documentation for Picis Security Manager.

l If Anesthesia Managerr is not configured for perioperative integration, these functions are handled in DB Editor.

For more information, see Configure the system for non-integrated operation and the following topics:

Access Rights

CareSuite Users
